DKA.Title: دلائل الخيرات وسوارق الانوار فى ذكر الصلاة على النبي المختار; Dalā'il al-h̬ayrāt wa-sawāriq al-anwār fī d̠̠ikr al-ṣalāt 'alā al-nabī al-muh̬tār

div.h4:
دلائل الخيرات وسوارق الانوار فى ذكر الصلاة على النبي المختار
Dalā'il al-h̬ayrāt wa-sawāriq al-anwār fī d̠̠ikr al-ṣalāt 'alā al-nabī al-muh̬tār
div.p:
Beskrivelse
Praying for the Prophet. Illuminations in gold, blue and red. Illuminations of Makkah and Medhīnah. Text is enclosed within gold and black multiple frames. Devotional text Nash̬ī Described in detail in: Catalogue of Oriental Manuscripts in Danish Collections, vol. 5,3 [pp. 1289-1293]
div.div:
